Reviews.Title: excellent television!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My husband and I are an ex-military family, we bought this tv in our first year of marriage in NE. 10 years and approximately 2500 miles later it is still working! I am very impressed that it has withstood moving companies and ourselves through many moves, get this,  without any major damage.  Meaning since the purchase (display model, too!)this t.v. has cost nothing and shows no signs of dying any time soon! Love it!

ProductInfo.Features:
56-inch HDTV monitor with 16:9 aspect ratio; 53.87 x 54.62 x 26.37 inches (W x H x D)
Digital Image Scaling technology upconverts all sources to 1080i
Dual tuner picture-in-picture with 12 multi-index window
2 component video inputs, 3 S-video inputs, 4 AV inputs (1 front, 3 rear)
20-watt bass reflection system with front-firing side speakers
ProductInfo.Name: JVC AV-56WP30 I'Art Pro 56" Widescreen HDTV-Ready Rear-Projection TV (Black)
